projects.title: Refoundry
projects.subTitle: Contemporary & modern visual identity for a tech platform
projects.description:
Refoundry is a unique Italian platform that brings together young, talented professionals and small to medium-sized businesses (SMEs) looking for new leadership. The platform aims to preserve business legacies while injecting new energy and expertise into the acquired SMEs. It's an exciting opportunity for both young talent seeking new challenges and founders and owners of SMEs looking to secure their legacy.

The concept of the visual Identity stems from the intergenerational exchange that the platform strives to achieve. Wave diffraction was chosen as a metaphor for depicting the concept, which is reflected in the logomark and the visual imagery.

projects.title: Mangala group
projects.subTitle: Organic hand drawn illustrations for the Brand Identity of Romarì
projects.description:
Romarì is an Italian manufacturing company that produces and sells fragrances, essential oils,natural extracts flavoring for the food and personal care product industries. The company work in partnership with agricultural businesses and certified suppliers around the world to produce unique solutions.

Organic and hand-drawn illustration style was chosen as a part of the visual identity system to reflect the brand values: transparency, respect for people and the environment. For this purpose, a range of compositions were envisioned and brought to life illustrating scenarios of product application. These illustrations were developed using mixed production techniques combining analog and digital means.

projects.title: 36 days of type
projects.subTitle: Establishing my illustration style drawing letters and numbers
projects.description:
36 Days of Type is a project that invites designers, illustrators and graphic artists to express their particular interpretation of the letters and numbers of the Latin alphabet.

A yearly open call exploring the creative boundaries of letterforms, where participants are challenged to design a letter or number each day for 36 consecutive days. For this edition, I tried to explore and develop my illustration style. I'm a fan of things that are natural and organic and tried to reflect it in my works by giving my illustrations a handrawn look.

projects.title: Personal Archive
projects.subTitle: A collection of Illustrations
projects.description: Some illustrations from my personal archive. I've always sketched random things since childhood, but didn't know if they were good enough to illustrate or produce them for personal/commercial purposes and to show myself as an artist/ Illustrator. Good feedback from my friends/peers made me digitise them. The following pages contain some outputs from my sketchbook archive. There are a lot that I haven't digitised yet. Hoping to do them in my free time. My illustrations are a reflection of my personality-fun to be with- and the way my brain works - overthinking about any and every situation visualizing endless possibilities.

projects.title: Are you Still Watching?
projects.subTitle: A documented report on the personalisation of streaming platforms
projects.description: Are you still watching? is a printed report aims at defining a taxonomy of strategies that streaming platforms use to attain user retention. Four platforms – Netflix, Prime video, Youtube, Twitch– were choosen for the scope of this research and analysis because of their content similarities and differences. Three questions of interest were defined for the research and then analyzed. Findings are presented with the help of visualizations.
projects.projectType: Editorial design, Data and Information Visualization
projects.collab: Team Project with Marco Perico, Lorenzo Bernini, Davide Perucchini, Chiara Caputo, Irene Casano, Yasmine Hamdani
